msbt.message: I got a couple good naps in yesterday, so here I am, greetin' the dawn! !
The morning air makes it all worth it. That chill fills my lungs with vim!
I was wantin' to make my days longer, so I started waking up earlier than usual.Well, now I got more time than I know what to do with Guess I oughta pick up some hobbies.
Hey there, kiddo. Yeah, I know it's late, but I can't sleep on account of a really swell afternoon nap.Anyway, I'm doing a few rounds around the island, keeping an eye on things. All's clear!
I'm not out late. I'm just up really early. Good morning! Gahaha!
Normally I'm in bed by midevening, but something in the air's given me a dash of youthful pep!
